title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-4.1 - Landfill permit application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-4.1 - Landfill permit application requirements

State Regulations

Unless otherwise exempt, the owner or operator of a
landfill must obtain a permit from the department. In addition to the criteria
found in section
360.16
of this Title, a permit
application for a landfill must contain the information enumerated in this

Subpart: Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-4.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
